mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(IAMPORT_IMP_UID, 1, 4) AS YEAR, SUBSTR(IAMPORT_IMP_UID, 5,2) AS MONTH, SUBSTR(IAMPORT_IMP_UID, 7,2) AS DAY , SUM(ALLSUM) as TOTAL FROM PAYMENT GROUP BY ROLLUP(SUBSTR(IAMPORT_IMP_UID, 1, 4), SUBSTR(IAMPORT_IMP_UID, 5,2), SUBSTR(IAMPORT_IMP_UID, 7,2)) HAVING SUBSTR(IAMPORT_IMP_UID, 1, 4) = '2022' AND SUBSTR(IAMPORT_IMP_UID, 7,2) IS NULL AND SUBSTR(IAMPORT_IMP_UID, 5,2) IS NOT NULL
